availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert W. Eades (Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, farmer. )

body.p: Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary A. Eades. Father of Mary E. Eades, Sarah E. Eades, Rebecca E. Eades, Edward J. Eades, Robert E. Eades, Charles E. Eades, Eleutheria T. Eades, and Alice M. Eades. Farmer in Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Muhlenberg County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, District 1, p. 186A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, District 1, p. 573.
"Robert W. "Bob" Eades (1816-1907)," Find A Grave, Memorial #74349153, accessed January 19, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/74349153.
